title: Meaning Crisis Beyond Christendom with John Vervaeke, Tom Holland, the Nones
description:
John and I have our fourth chat. We cover a lot of ground in this one. 
The Meaning Crisis isn't just post-Christian it's also post-Buddhist. We talk about implicit performative Christianity as explained by Jordan Peterson and Tom Holland. Notes and links below. 
John Vervaeke and Andrew Sweeny: https://youtu.be/C42TmeFHNmI
John Vervaeke Jan 2020 Q/A https://youtu.be/7LH77EpSRNw
John, Mary Kochan and JP Marceau https://youtu.be/KRDLCasZ4Ps
John Vervaeke on Rebel Wisdom After the Meaning Crisis https://youtu.be/yz6qgfjGMAg
Stephen Batchelor After Buddhism https://amzn.to/2RX2qSp
Evan Thompson Why I'm Not a Buddhist https://amzn.to/2Um2psw
Tom Holland Dominion https://amzn.to/2RR9VKv
Bart and Tony Campolo Why I left, why I stayed https://youtu.be/p4heKWpUWnU
Bart and Tony Campolo book Why I Left, Why I stayed https://amzn.to/2vMcwge
Jordan Hall a religion that's not a religion https://youtu.be/H6xfZZ5T0Lk

Notes: 
After Socrates
Wisdom
Generational divides
Steven Bachelor After Buddhism 
Evan Thompson Why I’m Not a Buddhist
Tom Holland
A performative argument
Jordan peterson, Sam harris

The Nones
What the theists and the atheists get wrong about the nones
Christopher Mastropietro
Bart Campolo
It’s not performatively coherent for them
Moderator, a bridge builder
Trans-tribal
There’s a meta-crisis
Complex systems theory

Wisdom and authority

Jordan Hall conversation: performative aspect, Innovator’s Dilemma
Innovation gives way to optimization, reciprocal narrowing, like oil
Addicted to Christianity in the West?
So woven to oil, can’t be any other

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/2uUhZBK The link will prompt you to download the software for this free group messaging service. This link updates every 100 users so look for the most recent videos if this link doesn't work.

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

All Amazon links here are part of the Amazon Affiliate Program. Amazon pays me a small commission at no additional cost to you if you buy through one of the product links here. This is is one (free to you) way to support my videos.

To support this channel/podcast with Ethereum (ETH): 0xd3F649C3403a4789466c246F32430036DADf6c62

https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Also on Lbry: https://lbry.tv/@paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A



Thomas Kuhn
Epistemically bounded this way
Descarte, a change in the theory of matter
It’s primary characteristic is that it resists, it gives us experimentation
Four E cognitive science
The project to deeply deconstruct the Cartesian dualism
The human phenomenon is misrepresented by these dualisms
Perform as if dualism is true, perform in a continual cosmos, 
Other dualisms

What is authority? 
Foucalt wisdom, technology of the self
Triggers aspiration, afford aspiration
A particular kind of flow
How do we do this process of aspiration? 
Serious play, take up a role that gets people into the anagoge that affords aspiration
Separation from the monastery to the university
University to the market
West had three locuses of authority
The church, the state and the market off against each other
The homogenization of power
The difference has progressively disappeared
A stupefaction of power, power has lost the ability to self-correct
The elites are seen as less and less responsive
Because there aren’t opponent processing among the powers
Such a turning on the elites
They’re not good problem solvers anymore, yet they get more and more powerful and wealthy
Reciprocal opening
